wishdalemod:wishdalebadge.NAME: Wishdale Badge
wishdalemod:wishdalebadge.FLAVOR: The operator carries out the duty of throwing hands. Specially issued this badge. To prove it.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack card each turn deals damage twice, with the second damage reduced to half of the attack power.

wishdalemod:AncestralLauncher.NAME: Ancestral Launcher
wishdalemod:AncestralLauncher.FLAVOR: Go, make it even more explosive!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack card each turn deals damage three times, with the latter two damages reduced to half of the attack power.

wishdalemod:GoldBoneDice.NAME: Golden Bone Dice
wishdalemod:GoldBoneDice.FLAVOR: The golden-inlaid bone dice only have one side engraved with a mark representing survival, as for the other nineteen sides...

wishdalemod:RoaringHand.NAME: Roaring Hand
wishdalemod:RoaringHand.FLAVOR: Hit the target, shake the earth.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every consecutive attack card played, gain temporary strength that increases by 1, up to a maximum of 15. If no attack cards are played in a turn, the bonus is reset.

wishdalemod:AncientTreeFruit.NAME: Ancient Tree Fruit
wishdalemod:AncientTreeFruit.FLAVOR: Sammy's child made a wish by burying it in the tree seeds, covered by the white snow. When the tree grows strong, pluck the first four fruits, leaving the smallest one for future generations to wish upon. The remaining fruits are offerings to Sammy to seek answers.

wishdalemod:Ruozhitutou.NAME: Ruozhi Rabbit Head
DESCRIPTIONS: @Believe in the Soul of the Weapon!@ NL @All units attack!@ NL @I'll bite you to death!@
